Class GenerateInfoFiles

java.lang.Object
edu.project.datagen.GenerateInfoFiles
public final class GenerateInfoFiles extends Object
GenerateInfoFiles

This very simple version generates a few flat files with fixed demo data. No user input is required.

Outputs:

  • data/products.txt → lines like: ProductID;ProductName;UnitPrice
  • data/salesmen_info.txt → lines like: DocType;DocNumber;FirstName;LastName
  • data/salesmen/{DocNumber}.txt → first line DocType;DocNumber, then a few sales: ProductID;Quantity

    • createSalesMenFile

      public static void createSalesMenFile(int lines, String name, long id, String docType) throws IOException
      First line: DocType;DocNumber Then a couple of sales lines: ProductID;Quantity
      Parameters:
      lines - how many sales lines to write (we cap it to SAMPLE_SALES length)
      id - document number (used as file name)
      docType - document type (e.g., CC)
      Throws:
      IOException
